message: By the author of the book with the same name. A revised edition of the book is coming November 2013
story: Mohammad Tayseer shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The Design of Everyday Things - Udacity
caption: udacity.com
description: Everyone designs. Design occurs anytime you deliberately change an environment to make things better. When you decide what seat to take in an auditorium you’re designing your experience. When you rearrange the furniture in a room or draft an email, you’re designing. This series of courses is intende...
